Detailed Description

template<typename Matrix1, typename Matrix2, typename IndexType = typename Matrix1::index_type, typename ValueType = typename Matrix1::value_type, typename MemorySpace = typename cusp::minimum_space<typename Matrix1::memory_space, typename Matrix2::memory_space>::type>
class cusp::hyb_matrix_view< Matrix1, Matrix2, IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace >

hyb_matrix_view : Hybrid ELL/COO matrix view

Template Parameters:
Matrix1 Type of ell
Matrix2 Type of coo
IndexType Type used for matrix indices (e.g. int).
ValueType Type used for matrix values (e.g. float).
MemorySpace A memory space (e.g. cusp::host_memory or cusp::device_memory)
